title: Authors and Citation
text: Mücke M (2025). isocountry: ISO 3166-1 Country Codes. R package version 0.4.0.9000, https://m-muecke.github.io/isocountry/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {isocountry: ISO 3166-1 Country Codes},   author = {Maximilian Mücke},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.4.0.9000},   url = {https://m-muecke.github.io/isocountry/}, }

title: ISO 3166-1 Country Codes
text: package contains following datasets: isocountry: dataset resulting merging ISO-3166 UN Region Codes. isocurrency: ISO 4217 currency codes combined ISO 3166 country codes easy joining. Package insipred ISO-3166-Countries--Regional-Codes project.

title: ISO 3166-1 Country Codes
text: can install released version isocountry CRAN : development version GitHub :

title: ISO 3166-1 Country Codes
code: library(dplyr) library(isocountry)  isocountry |>   left_join(isocurrency, by = join_by(alpha_2 == country_code)) #> # A tibble: 265 × 22 #>    name       alpha_2 alpha_3 country_code iso_3166_2 is_independent region_code #>    <chr>      <chr>   <chr>   <chr>        <chr>      <lgl>                <int> #>  1 Afghanist… AF      AFG     004          ISO 3166-… TRUE                   142 #>  2 Åland Isl… AX      ALA     248          ISO 3166-… FALSE                  150 #>  3 Albania    AL      ALB     008          ISO 3166-… TRUE                   150 #>  4 Algeria    DZ      DZA     012          ISO 3166-… TRUE                     2 #>  5 American … AS      ASM     016          ISO 3166-… FALSE                    9 #>  6 Andorra    AD      AND     020          ISO 3166-… TRUE                   150 #>  7 Angola     AO      AGO     024          ISO 3166-… TRUE                     2 #>  8 Anguilla   AI      AIA     660          ISO 3166-… FALSE                   19 #>  9 Antarctica AQ      ATA     010          ISO 3166-… FALSE                   NA #> 10 Antigua a… AG      ATG     028          ISO 3166-… TRUE                    19 #> # ℹ 255 more rows #> # ℹ 15 more variables: region_name <chr>, subregion_code <int>, #> #   subregion_name <chr>, intermediate_region_code <int>, #> #   intermediate_region_name <chr>, m49_code <int>, oecd_member <lgl>, #> #   eu_member <lgl>, emu_member <lgl>, eea_member <lgl>, currency_name <chr>, #> #   currency_code <chr>, currency_number <chr>, country_name <chr>, #> #   country_number <chr>

what: Country names with ISO country codes — isocountry
title: Country names with ISO country codes — isocountry
text: ISO 3166-1 country codes full country names, UN regional classifications, OECD membership status, EU membership status, Economic Monetary Union (EMU) membership status, European Economic Area (EEA) membership status.

title: Country names with ISO country codes — isocountry
Country names with ISO country codes — isocountry
text: data frame 249 rows 17 variables: name country name alpha_2 ISO alpha-2 code alpha_3 ISO alpha-3 code country_code numeric code iso_3166_2 ISO 3166-2 subdivision code is_independent country independent region_code UN region code region_name UN region name subregion_code UN subregion code subregion_name UN subregion name intermediate_region_code UN intermediate region code intermediate_region_name UN intermediate region name m49_code UN M49 code oecd_member country OECD member eu_member country EU member emu_member country EMU member eea_member country EEA member

title: ISO currency codes — isocurrency
text: ISO 4217 currency codes full country names.

title: ISO currency codes — isocurrency
text: data frame 269 rows 4 variables: currency_name ISO currency name currency_code ISO currency code currency_number ISO currency number country_name ISO country name country_code ISO alpha-2 country code country_number ISO country number

title: ISO currency codes — isocurrency
code: isocurrency #> # A tibble: 258 × 6 #>    currency_name         currency_code currency_number country_name country_code #>    <chr>                 <chr>         <chr>           <chr>        <chr>        #>  1 Afghani               AFN           971             Afghanistan  AF           #>  2 Euro                  EUR           978             Åland Islan… AX           #>  3 Lek                   ALL           008             Albania      AL           #>  4 Algerian Dinar        DZD           012             Algeria      DZ           #>  5 US Dollar             USD           840             American Sa… AS           #>  6 Euro                  EUR           978             Andorra      AD           #>  7 Kwanza                AOA           973             Angola       AO           #>  8 East Caribbean Dollar XCD           951             Anguilla     AI           #>  9 East Caribbean Dollar XCD           951             Antigua and… AG           #> 10 Argentine Peso        ARS           032             Argentina    AR           #> # ℹ 248 more rows #> # ℹ 1 more variable: country_number <chr>
